mapper.update:
update client_employee
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nick_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
financial_body_pk = #{financial_body_pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
financial_body_name = #{financial_body_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sales = #{sales,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sales_name = #{sales_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{update_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pk = #{pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
public_flg = #{public_flg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birth_year = #{birth_year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{update_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_flg = #{delete_flg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
relation_level = #{relation_level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
back_level = #{back_level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
market_level = #{market_level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pk = #{pk,jdbcType=CHAR}

update client_employee set delete_flg='Y' where pk in
#{item}

update client_employee set delete_flg='N' where pk in
#{item}
mapper.select:
select A.name, A.nick_name, A.sex, CASE WHEN isnull(A.birth_year) or A.birth_year='' then 0 else year(now())-A.birth_year END as age, A.wechat, A.qq, A.type, A.cellphone, A.telephone, A.fax, A.id, A.financial_body_pk, A.financial_body_name, B.client_area as area, A.sales, A.sales_name, A.create_user, A.update_user, A.pk, A.comment, A.public_flg, A.delete_flg, A.birth_year, A.create_time, A.update_time, A.relation_level, A.back_level, A.market_level from client_employee A LEFT JOIN client B ON A.financial_body_pk = B.pk
and (A.sales like CONCAT('%',#{params.bo.sales,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or A.public_flg ='Y')
and A.name like CONCAT('%',#{params.bo.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and B.client_area = #{params.bo.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and A.financial_body_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.bo.financial_body_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and A.sales_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.bo.sales_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and A.delete_flg =#{params.bo.delete_flg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and A.delete_flg = 'N'
